cause.description:
Keshet is a grassroots organization working for the full inclusion of lesbian, gay, bisexual, and transgender Jews in Jewish life. Led and supported by LGBT Jews and straight allies, Keshet offers resources, training, and technical assistance to create inclusive Jewish communities in Boston, Colorado, the San Francisco Bay Area, and nationwide.
1. Lesbian, gay, bisexual, and transgender Jews should be fully included in all aspects of Jewish life.
2. Jewish communities are stronger, healthier spaces when all Jews are welcomed, valued, and able to be their whole selves.
cause.mission: Working for the full inclusion of lesbian, gay, bisexual, and transgender Jews in Jewish life
cause.name: Keshet
